channel.title: How to get support and report bugs
channel.description:
In the Feedback category we welcome feature requests and discussions about how to make the app better.
If you have a **support question** or want to **report a bug**, please do the following: - Open the app - Goto the 'How To' tab - Tap 'Contact Support' - Describe your problem in the email
This makes it easier for us to give you quick and direct support. If you report a bug, we also get a log file that helps us resolve the issue.
For clarity, a typical support issue could be "I have problems unlocking my subscription" and a typical bug could be "the app crashes every time I do this".
Thanks!

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
There is no way for us to associate your subscription with the iCloud email so it doesn’t matter.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get support and report bugs

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
I could send it, but I wanted it to come from the address associated with my Apple ID/Auxy subscription, so responses would come back to the right address and you’d be able to ID the sub account, if needed.
(My iOS Apple Mail app is set up to use my work email.)

Read full topic
item.source: How to get support and report bugs

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
ThoughtfulNoise:

The ‘Vibrato’ control label is missing from all the ‘… Section’ instruments in the Orchestral Strings pack.

This will be fixed soon.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get support and report bugs

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
ThoughtfulNoise:

I sent it to my main address, then resent from there, including the attachment generated by the app.

I don’t understand how you could send an email to yourself but not to us then?

Read full topic
item.source: How to get support and report bugs

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
I sent it to my main address, then resent from there, including the attachment generated by the app.

It’s a basically a bug report…
The ‘Vibrato’ control label is missing from all the ‘… Section’ instruments in the Orchestral Strings pack.

iPad Mini 6 / iPadOS 15.0.1
iPhone 12 Pro / iOS 15.0.1

Read full topic
item.source: How to get support and report bugs

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
We can investigate if it’s possible to open alternative apps nowadays. It certainly has not been the case before, which is why this is a bit of a pita for people who use e.g. Gmail.

Whether or not it’s sent from the email connected to iCloud doesn’t matter for us, since there’s no way we can access it regardless.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get support and report bugs

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: ThoughtfulNoise
item.description:
Was going to report a bug using the app’s built in Contact Support route, but noticed that it only appears to offer ‘From:’ accounts set up for iOS Mail app.

Might it be possible to support sending from other installed email apps, or at least, their Default Mail App*, which people might be using with the email address used with their Apple ID/Auxy subscription?

* Changing the Default Mail App setting doesn’t change things.

(iPadOS 15.0.1)

Read full topic
item.source: How to get support and report bugs

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Hey! The app should warn you that the project might not sound exactly the same if you choose to update the instruments. Although, if you do, you can use the added instrument settings to dial in the sound you want. Hope that helps!

Also great if you can send any support questions via email, as this post outlines:

How to get support and report bugs Auxy Feedback
In the Feedback category we welcome feature requests and discussions about how to make the app better. If you have a support question or want to report a bug, please do the following: Open the app Goto the ‘How To’ tab Tap ‘Contact Support’ Describe your problem in the email This makes it easier for us to give you quick and direct support. If you report a bug, we also get a log file that helps us resolve the issue. For clarity, a typical support issue could be “I have problems unlocking my …

Read full topic
item.source: How to get support and report bugs

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: Ibimusic
item.description:
I made a song about two years ago and I returned to the app last year when it became free. I have since paid for the subscription.
The app asked me to update the instruments, so I did. Now the song sounds terrible to me. Can you offer some insight?

Read full topic

item.description:
There are other options for export. Render audio first:

Then hit export and you get these:

Uncompressed wave is probably the format you’re looking for.

item.dc:creator: REEKO
item.description:
Hi! Dont know where to ask but can we have options for audio rendering? Like we can render our projects to wav files instead of just m4a?

item.title: How to get support and report bugs
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
In the Feedback category we welcome feature requests and discussions about how to make the app better.

If you have a support question or want to report a bug, please do the following:

  • Open the app
  • Goto the ‘How To’ tab
  • Tap ‘Contact Support’
  • Describe your problem in the email

This makes it easier for us to give you quick and direct support. If you report a bug, we also get a log file that helps us resolve the issue.

For clarity, a typical support issue could be “I have problems unlocking my subscription” and a typical bug could be “the app crashes every time I do this”.

Thanks!
